post.text: Weapons of war like those used in Orlando and San Bernardino have no place on our streets.

comment.author: Katherine
comment.text: What will you do with the millions that are already out there?

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: Collect them and toss them into the sea.. make a Coral Reef!

replies.author: Jillian
replies.text: give them a voucher for one the founders intended them to have! :v .. . . .

replies.author: Christine
replies.text: If bought legitimately seller has records

replies.author: Shania
replies.text: its called public policy. its never perfect and there are always loopholes. but they tend to work overall. like how the GOP allowed assault rifles in the first place and it worked in favor of domestic terrorists
